resource.chars: ※（不明）廣橋中納言家由緒被召出支證之處明徳

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4837,3840h-201v-3840h201v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 三年五月三日祖父以御書但正文紛失拜領以来當知

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4534,3840h-181v-3840h181v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 行之處去應永十五年大舘申給云々爰被召

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M4283,3840h-231v-3840h231v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 出彼證文訖去明徳元潤三　十六亡父以御下文被下之

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3957,3840h-202v-3840h202v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 中間廣橋家雖被申給其後勝定院殿御代

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3675,3840h-191v-3840h191v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 被返下于今當知行之由申之於大舘者御下

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3363,3840h-203v-3840h203v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 文先日之間所申雖非無其謂未施行也又應

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3067,3840h-197v-3840h197v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 永年中御判為還補者争不載其詞哉旁以

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2489,3840h-221v-3840h221v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 非無御不審所詮至廣橋者雖令紛失御書

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2132,3840h-194v-3840h194v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 既而施行分明之上細々奉公之間難被對揚

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1860,3840h-204v-3840h204v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 上者以御判可被返付廣橋家也焉

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1541,3840h-172v-3840h172v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 永享二年十二月廿五日　大和守貞連（花押）

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M395,3840h-247v-3840h247v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 一乗院家雑掌申就若宮祭礼田楽頭役
